article: The sun didn't come out. The 15 - year - old girl Razeena said goodbye to her mother and left for school. She  _  they couldn't see where to go ! "Down here ! and follow me !" she yelled.  _  ) down the stairs. So she pounded up and down the stairs, weaving through the smoke and heat to  _  more people. "Thank you so much," they told her over and over, " Without you, we never would have  made it  ." When Razeena walked home, shaking and  _  with dirt, mother cried, " What happened?!"
